reviews.review: Loved it the ending leaves you breathless!
Absolute masterpieces. Best superheroe movie since The Dark Knight.
Fun for the whole family, trust me!

Should have been called part 1. Not a full story, ends on a cliffhanger with a year-long wait till the next one.

(This text box isn't letting me type w/no caps, testing on other sites show me that yes I turned caps lock off. It is just this website making me sound like a crazy person shouting on the internet)
Just  too good for words..... must watch!!!

I honestly didn’t think there was any way possible that Marvel could pull this off. So many characters, such high expectations, ten years of build-up, 2 1/2 hours long, etc. But they nailed it. The Empire Strikes Back of the Marvel movie universe. Funny, dark, creative. Five stars baby!

So before the ending I was thinking about giving the movie a 4 star but the balls to the wall ending that the Russo Brothers put in gave the film that edge making me love it even more giving it that five star. Plus The Guardians and their introduction was amazing.

Everyone who bought a ticket for this film is brainwashed. Producers for years have taken unsuccessful comic book franchises and mashed up successful heros next to them to brainwash the public into buying tickets for less successful franchises. Captain America was the least popular comic... but how do we make people buy a ticket for something they don’t like?.. Just put captain America with his buddy spider man, and iron man and people will buy a ticket. Most of you watching don’t even realize these notions when you buy a ticket. I miss when movies did something individualistic and creative every time. Those days are LONG gone. I REFUSE to give marvel a penny to make another movie.

What amazes me most about "Infinity War" is the sheer perfection Marvel films has accomplished in their universe building. It is so rich, so dense, that the film focuses on the villain as the main character, yet none of the heroes feel short changed. Their stories have a deep resonance that is unexpected in the genre.

If, as is my opinion, "The Dark Knight" is the best superhero film, then "Avengers: Infinity War" is the best comic book film.
The most boring movie I have ever seen in years. The worst pacing I have seen in a movie since Manos. Pretty but borderline unwatchable.
